data.actual_result: You get a "50 pins limit reached" message, which is not true
data.expected_result: You get an unmoded error or you are kicked out of the confirmation
data.short_description: When trying to pin a message, if you loose mod with the confirmation message opens, you get a rate limit error
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a role with admin powers - Click "pin" on a message but don't confirm in the warning it gives you - Have someone take away that role - Once it's gone, try to allow the pin - Observe
